title: Church Complaints, Bill Cosby, Junior Poetry, Kim Kardashian more.
itunes:title: Church Complaints, Bill Cosby, Junior Poetry, Kim Kardashian more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! The just fine process has begun. Get it right here! Happy 420!!! Trump is battling his state governors over re-opening of the country. The Jackpot Joint of Jerusalem is having issues with coughing, drive thru communion and more. Bill Cosby's request for release had been denied. One World: Together at Home raised $128 million and was star studded. What happened with Teddy Riley and Babyface? The Chief Love Officer shares his thoughts on family love and brotherhood. Junior has special 420 poetry. J. Anthony Brown's stimulus program is genius. Kim Kardashian may have given TMI on quarantine life. Today we wrapped up the show with some short banter between Rich Uncle and his nephew, plus a friendly reminder.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
